title: (27700) Ribadeo - 47 Rúa Reinante
description: Laundry. Washing and drying, in front of the health center

title: (27700) Ribadeo - 9 Praza Matadoiro
description: Parking for 3 motorhomes without services. Not suitable for vehicles that are too wide. Magnificent views of Castropol and the estuary. Opposite is a small rest area with benches. Comments are welcome

title: (33760) Castropol - 16A Calle Puerto
description: Parking day and night in the dock of the port without services

title: (27700) Ribadeo - 34 Rúa da Fontenova
description: A parking lot without any visible service. Several motorhomes when we passed and we spent a night without problem in this parking lot of this fishing port.

title: (27713) Ribadeo - 44 Rúa Ramón González
description: Parking in the center of Ribadeo, allowed overnight.

title: (33760) Castropol - 9 Calle Marqués de Santa Cruz
title_short: (33760) Castropol - 9 Calle Marqués de Santa Cruz
description: After calling the local police, they told me that there was no problem in parking and staying as long as they did not camp. We spent a very quiet night. Maybe the terrain is a little steep in the area with better views. The best area is the one attached to the wall on the left as soon as you access it. Perfect place to walk around the village and live with the local neighborhood

title: (27700) Ribadeo - Baixada Paseo Marítimo
description: Quiet place to sleep but no service.

title: (27700) Ribadeo - 2 Avenida de Rosalía de Castro
title_short: (27700) Ribadeo - 2 Avenida de Rosalía de Castro
description: Laundromat Gran Via. Perfect for doing laundry while you visit the city. It has a parking in front to leave the motorhome.

title: (33760) Castropol - 1 Calle de Vicente Loriente
description: Pigeon Field. Parking day and night very quiet. Without services Good situation to access the historic center of the town. Good views in the surroundings. Comments are welcome

title: (27700) Ribadeo - 5 Avenida de Rosalía de Castro
title_short: (27700) Ribadeo - 5 Avenida de Rosalía de Castro
description: Ground parking without services. Perfect situation to go to the center of town. Next there is a supermarket. Denoche can be a bit noisy because of the comings and goings of cars especially on Saturday night Comments are welcome

title: (27710) Ribadeo - 11 Paseo Maritimo
description:
Open parking, more secure
 than the one behind the harbour, below the hotel cafeteria bar, at the entrance to the marina. Very pleasant

title: (27713) Ribadeo - 31 Rúa Pintor Fierros
description: You can shower in the changing rooms of the sports hall .

title: (27710) Ribadeo - 20 Rúa Julio Lazúrtegui
description: Free ground parking, close to the center of town. We did not spend the night, but quite large and easy access.

title: (27713) Ribadeo - 33 Avenida de Galicia
description: Laundry. Washer and dryer

title: (27700) Ribadeo - 47 Avenida de Galicia
description: Ground parking without services allowed overnight. It is not a luxury but it has good location to visit Ribadeo

title: (27710) Ribadeo - 1 Avenida de Rosalía de Castro
title_short: (27710) Ribadeo - 1 Avenida de Rosalía de Castro
description: Large field space next to the bus station. Dogs allowed. It has no services. Ideal for overnight Free. Access to the town center in 3 min on foot. Gadis supermarket nearby. Comments are appreciated

title: (27713) Ribadeo - 1 Calle Garitos Jardín
description: Repsol gas station with water access where the air and water service.

title: (33794) Figueras - 25A Avenida Trenor
description: We did not see any signs prohibiting staying overnight. There are restaurants around and there was a wonderful sunset.

title: (33769) Figueras - 27A Avenida de Gondán
description: Tables with barbecue grills and water

title: (33794) Castropol - Autovía del Cantábrico
description: Rest area on the highway. A8 Castropol, it is well signposted and access is very wide. It has a picnic area with tables and trees. The only drawback is that it is next to the highway and so is not very quiet.

title: (33794) Figueras - 29A Calle Campomanes
description: Good dirt parking, well leveled, flat, well located, close to the town center of Figueras (Asturias) and with good access for both vans and motorhomes. A quiet place both day and night, being a good place to spend the night and rest. A good place to enjoy a walk through the town and the spectacular Ria del Eo and its views of Castropol, Ribadeo ... A luxurious setting! The view (and visit ....) of Castropol is fabulous!

title: (27713) Ribadeo - 2 LU-P-5207
description: Santa Cruz viewpoint. Excellent views of Ribadeo and the river Eo. This is a shady recreation area with plenty of picnic tables. Plenty of parking space. Good access. Bar / Restaurant during the day

title: (33794) Figueras - 3A Avenida Trenor
description: Land parking in Figueras (Asturias), well leveled, flat, near the center of town, with good access for vans and motorhomes. Quiet place by day and also at night, making it a good option to spend the night and rest. A good place to enjoy a walk through the town and the surroundings of the spectacular Ria del Eo, with beautiful views of Castropol!

title: (27713) Ribadeo - LU-P-5207
description: Shaded, wooded picnic area and car park. Very quiet and relaxed overnight. Water source opposite the restaurant. There is a spectacular viewpoint. (The adjacent Park4Night car park is identical to this one.)

title: (27700) Ribadeo - 19 Carretera General
description: Parking Eroski shopping center, emptying services, water intake, gas station at gas station.

title: (27710) Ribadeo - 476-528 Avenida da Mariña
description: Empty, filled with free water

title: (33768) - 9A Aldea Salias
description: Access by bachedao road. The best views of the river. Without services

title: (27710) Ribadeo - 54 Estrada do Faro
description: Parking on the edge of the sea with a view of beautiful isla Pancha and the estuary.

title: (27700) Ribadeo - LU-140
description: Parking next to the lighthouse, we spent a quiet night with other vans .

title: (33794) Castropol - Unnamed Road
description:
Good place. There are sanitary facilities, picnic area, fountain. Pretty flat terrain. The beach is 100 m away, there is a path on the edge of the cliffs nearby.

Overnight stays are only permitted in the marked parking bays. It is forbidden in the unmarked area.

title: (33794) - 15A Aldea la Linera
description: Linera Cove. Beautiful place to relax by the river, picturesque view of Castropol and the Ria del Eo, hiking trail along the river, from Castropol to Figueras. ATTENTION IS ACCESSIBLE ONLY FROM BARS, THERE ARE OTHER ACCESS BUT THEY ARE TOO CLOSE FOR CAMPERS

title: (27710) Ribadeo - 2 Lugar Igrexa
description: Perfect flat site. Sheltered from the southwest wind. Well leveled. Fantastic views

title: (27710) Ribadeo - LU-140
description: Calm, beautiful view, small cove with showers.

title: (27710) Ribadeo -
description: Small place to stop with good views. No prohibition signs

title: (33794) Figueras -
description:
Between hedge and tamarisk, nice spot for a bivouac. A little of
 passage of walkers during the day but very quiet at night. Beautiful view of the sea and the Rio Eo estuary, on the border of Galicia and Asturias.

title: (33769) - 3A Caserio Loureiro
description: Drinking water source. You can move away with the van to fill the water tank without problem. It does not fit more than one at a time.

title: (33794) Figueras -
description: EXPECTACULAR…..!!!! Site on the edge of the cliff, completely flat, with low grass... well, the beginning... spectacular...

title: (33794) Castropol - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking for 4 camper. Access by dirt road although not too narrow. There are no services. It's not flat but the views are luxurious. No noise, only the waves of the sea

title: (33794) Castropol -
description: A place for a van or van small recess almost flat a turn sheltered from the wind compared to the spot in front of the creek it is a quiet place, only the sound of the waves with a magnificent sea view in the evening as in the morning .

title: () -
description: Area with many tables and barbecues. Beautiful area. They have a fountain with water although the day we were there they had it cut. Forbidden nights

title: (27710) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Indicated as a walking trail. Place next to the sea, small dirt road with cartridges leading here. We just did it and we had a wonderful lunchspot !!! Keep this place clean

title: (27710) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place with picnic tables and barbecues. Very quiet, magnificent view of the sea and the cliffs. Very little frequented except by a few fishermen. Night forbidden along cliffs.

title: (33794) Figueras -
description: Great view. No service at all, so pure nature. Only come if you don't want to leave any traces!

name: El Huerto
title: (27713) El Huerto
description: Roadside restaurant offering parking day night meal delicious, wine included, paella for 2 people near the cathedrals.

name: Camping Ribadeo
title: (27713) Camping Ribadeo
description:
Ribadeo, Autovia del Cantabrico.
Camping Ribadeo, with swimming pool, service area and a few kilometers from the sea. Some pitches are not very large.

name: Camping la Viña
title: (33794) Camping la Viña
description: Castropol, N-640. Camping La Viña. Open all year. Call before to get the opening.

name: Camping Vegamar
title: (33794) Camping Vegamar
description: Vegamar campsite. Clean and wooded

name: Camping Playa Penarronda
title: (33794) Camping Playa Penarronda
description: Camping on the beach, very quiet and with the necessary services for emptying black and gray water, filling with water, laundry, and supermarket.

title: (33794) Castropol - CP-2
description: Remote and nice Spot, 4x4 recommended. Quite windy, depending on conditions. Nice view, sandy beach 5 mins walk away.

title: (27797) Ribadeo - 6 Lugar Coedo
description: Great lonely place on a small plateau with a sea view. Every now and then hikers come by. Beautiful area. There are always small spots along this stretch of coast. More for vans and small motorhomes. Not forbidden to stay overnight. Please do not leave any rubbish or toilet paper. Thanks!

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - 9 TC-3
description: Beach parking, surfer atmosphere. Land at the top with sea access 300 m. Water showers available from 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. approximately. Many surf schools. Nice little restaurant.

title: (27715) Rinlo -
description: Small driveway, bumpy, more suitable for vans than campers. platform overlooking the sea; surrounded by yellow and purple flowers. No services!

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - 9 TC-3
description: Directly above the beach with a great view. There is also a small playground and picnic tables.

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - N-634
description: Have the blue Campingaz cartridges

title: (27715) Rinlo -
description: Small spot for max 2 small campers. Relatively easy accessible, though use a spotter to check if your van is suitable to drive to the spot. Overlooking the ocean and spot on to watch the sunset!

title: (27797) Ribadeo - Rodríguez Murias
description: Great flat site next to the sea, without signs of forbidden to stay overnight and with maximum and level privacy. You know that if the sea is strong there will be noise from the waves, it was never a problem for us?

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - Km 548 N-634
description: Gas station bathrooms to get out of trouble

title: (27715) Rinlo -
description:
Spot in the middle of nature at the edge of the quiet water, just the sound of the waves.
a few level seats

title: (33749) Santa Gadea -
description:
Magnificent wild land with direct access to the beach! lots of space and easy access
 quiet and very clean
respect this magical place please?
no waste paper, cigarette butts, wipes and company...at the risk of no longer having access to them.

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - 12 TC-3
description: Its a awsome place to stay over night. A dream

name: Camping El Carbayin
title: (33749) Camping El Carbayin
description: Located in the town of Serantes, halfway between Tapia de Casariego and Ribadeo, and a few minutes from Figueras, Castropol and Vegadeo. In a rural and calm environment.

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego -
description: Simply the best spot we have ever been. Really. Hard to describe with words. You do not need 4x4, but I would say this is for vans only. You do not turn left on the dirt road but continue straight on a grass road. There is a leveled parking with direct view at the beach, coast and lighthouse in the far. We slept completely alone by the sound of the waves. Also asked few people if its ok to stay and it should be at least for one night. PLEASE keep it clean here and stay calm and friendly. Preserve this spot for the van traveling community. :-)

title: (27715) Ribadeo - 17 Rodríguez Murias
description: Leisure area, with barbecue and benches, with stunning sea views. Very close to the village, with shop and restaurant. Very calm.

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - Unnamed Road
description: Large free parking near the beach of Serantes. Bar, toilets, showers and beach taps. Do not park in front of wooden cabins as there is a sensor/camera that sets off an alarm for one of the locals.

title: (33749) Cornallo -
description: A place with wonderful views, without people, a dirt road that leads to perfection, unique views, paths to reach the beach on foot.

name: Camping Rinlo Costa
title: (27715) Camping Rinlo Costa
description: The campsite makes a very young (new) impression. It is a bit out of the way, if you approach it from the west you have to drive under a railway bridge that is only passable by smaller vans. However, there is no problem from the east. The Playa de Las Catedrales is approx. 6 km away. The small village of Rinlo is within walking distance. There is a small swimming pool and a playground. You can also buy small snacks in the small cafeteria.

title: (27715) Rinlo - Avenida Leopoldo Calvo Sotelo
description: Fantastic location directly adjacent to the sea and coastal path. Lots of level parking near to small village with restaurants. Quiet getaway. No services.

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - Caserio Serantes
description: Well leveled parking perfect for overnight. It has no services, although there is a tap to fill water in the cemetery opposite. Comments are appreciated

title: (33749) Cornallo -
description: An amazing place facing the ocean!!! Respect this place free of all waste.

title: (27715) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Roadside, fairly flat terrain, can hold 6 or 7 VAN. Nice view of the sea on the left and the village on the right. Easy access. Easily accessible with a 6 m van. Police drove past us several times during the day, but didn't say anything. The night was without any problems. Really great place!

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful place right by the sea with a view of the beach! 4x4 not absolutely necessary, but a bit steep descent. Please keep the place clean. Take your toilet paper with you, or at least burn it!

title: (27715) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Small natural setting at the edge of the cliffs. Capacity for 3 or 4 vans.

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - Unnamed Road
description: Forget all the places in Portugal. This is the nicest pitch ever! 4x4 can, but doesn't have to. For a van, it should also work without problems. Larger RVs shouldn't try unless the drivers are painless! Super 360 degree panorama and absolute tranquility even in the high season. Please keep the place as clean as it is now!

title: (27715) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Parking on the cliffs. Very accessible and relatively plane. Wonderful view of the Atlantic. The road is very busy and quite narrow. In case of oncoming traffic in some places with larger motorhome caution is required.

title: (27715) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place, next to the sea, total tranquility, only the noise of the sea and the seagulls. Access without problem for vans and AC. It is 5 km from the beach of Las Catedrales.

title: (27715) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Cliff edge area in the heart of nature. For the day only

title: (27715) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Incredible area with good access to AC. Absolute relaxation and sea.

title: (33770) A Veiga - 1-3 Calle Emilio Cotarelo
description: Parking for services, evacuation of waste water and filling of clean water. Maximum stay of 72 hours. Close to the village with shops and supermarkets

title: (33778) Castropol - Unnamed Road
description: Barbecue and picnic tables surrounded by nature.

title: (27715) Meirengos - Unnamed Road
description: Easy to access place, with a small stretch of cliff accessible on foot just in front of the sea! Access to the beach right next door, few people in October! Great !!

title: (27715) Meirengos -
description: Spot on the side of the road with little traffic during the day ... Space for 2 motorhomes of about 7m ... On a slope... No prohibition ... No amenities ... On the edge water ... A field of cows across the road ... Easy access to the beach ... The magical sound of the waves ... A magnificent view ... Leave the place clean. 'please ... Kisses ...

title: (33770) Vegadeo - 9 Calle San Pedro
description: My self-service laundry Braña self-service laundry near the noveledo recreational area. Ample parking.

title: (27795) Ribadeo - Unnamed Road
description: Incredible views. You enter by a dirt road and arrive at a fabulous countryside. We ate and slept at the sound of the sea. Perfect and very quiet.

title: (33749) Tapia de Casariego - Caserio Serantes
description: Parking on lawn very quiet. Perfect for the night. There are no services. We made the night without noise or problems, 5 minutes walk from the pigeon beach

title: (27796) Ribadeo - LU-P-5201
description: Perfect place to have a snack if you are looking for tranquility. Large parking area, with stone tables under trees and shade. Next to the church and cemetery. With views of the sea. The highway passes behind but does not bother.

title: (27795) Ribadeo - LU-P-5206
description: Small car park at the edge of a busy road at night Pleasant with beach with rock at 100m. Surprise in the morning, baker's pass

title: (27795) Ribadeo - 21 LU-P-5201
description: Parking of the Church of Santa Eulalia de la Devesa 5 minutes from the Beach of the Cathedrals but very quiet, ideal if it is windy on the coast. Fairly leveled and gravelled, there is a picnic area only 20 meters away

title: (33748) Casariego - Unnamed Road
description: Tapia Casariego recreational area... with swings and tables... perfect for eating and spending the afternoon.... start your route....

title: (27795) Ribadeo - 11 LU-P-0610
description: Small parking by the road (not frequented,) and 2 km from the cathedral beach. located at the edge of cliffs were rocked by the sound of the waves. we are early October which explains the lack of attendance.Be taking a walk on the beach cathedrals, but at low tide only.

name: Camping Playa De Tapia
title: (33748) Camping Playa De Tapia
description: Playa de Tapia campsite, a small and beautiful campsite, very well located near the beach and 20 minutes from the center on foot. The only thing but spacious pitches are the bathroom and shower facilities that are old but very clean. by the way the very friendly owners

title: (33778) Vegadeo - AS-22
description: Picnic area with benches and barbecues, next to the river paved parking, quiet area.

title: (27796) Ribadeo - 37 Lugar Aldea O Rato
description: Free parking at the beach bar Praia Dos Castros. The field is very large and has different entrances. The owner of the bar, Diego, doesn't mind that we spend the night in the campa (it's a parking lot, not a campsite). Sea views and very close to Las Catedrales Beach. In low season I don't know if the beach bar will be open.

title: (27795) Ribadeo - 15 LU-P-0610
description: Beach of Illas (Islas). Superb location a few hundred meters from the cathedral beach. Ideal to escape the tourist bus from the main beach. No water and shower. Beautiful sunset. Parking with reduced spaces, near home holidays at this time of the year so ideal off season. Toilets closed out of season

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 5 Avenida San Esteban
title_short: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 5 Avenida San Esteban
description: Parking for motorhomes, maximum 72 hours, 200m from the village. 2 faucet available for fresh water removal and used for flushing the toilet cassette!

title: (27795) A Rochela - LU-P-0610
description: Very nice parking on top of the beach, near the access to the beach with showers and water, easy access and space for 2 on the first line of the cliff.

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 3 Calle Seara
description:
Bathrooms with showers, the water is not hot but you can shower with privacy and soap, thanks to Tapia for these facilities.

They close at 7:00 p.m., I think they open from 10 a.m.

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 13 Calle Francisco González Villamil
title_short: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 13 Calle Francisco González Villamil
description: Parking in the center of this small town. Almost direct access to the beach. The car park is very quiet, sufficiently isolated from the heart of the bustling city. We were only two vans parked there (no motorhomes). There is a little overlooked with the houses around that run along the beach. We made ourselves a little discreet in the morning. We had originally planned to go to a place in the middle of nature about ten minutes from Tapia de Casariego to sleep, but this seaside resort totally seduced us. There are many beaches, walks and viewpoints. The port square is very lively in the evening, mainly families knowing each other. We decided to make the most of it and highly recommend it!

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - Av. de Galicia, 4
title_short: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - Av. de Galicia, 4
description:
Laundry which belongs to the hotel "La Ruta", at 350 meters from the motorhome area. There are two washing machines (8 and 17 kg) and two dryers (17 kg).

Machines only accept coins, but there's a bell which you can ring and have the change.

name: Area Autocaravanas Casecha | Cubelas
title: (27714) Area Autocaravanas Casecha | Cubelas
description:
Farm area, for all types of housing vehicles, run by a charming couple.
Unique place, with countless activities to enjoy. The baker passes by every day and they sell their produce to the people of the area (all kinds of vegetables, fruits, homemade eggs, honey, etc.). For those who like peace, tranquility, enjoy the countryside. No limits to park our motorhomes, caravans, campers, vans, etc.

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 9 Calle Conrado Villar
title_short: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 9 Calle Conrado Villar
description: At the moment you can spend the night, lawn and level. Next to the sports center.

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 3 Plaza del Campogrande
title_short: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 3 Plaza del Campogrande
description: It is a car park in a single space, ONLY IN ENABLED AREAS DELIMITED BY WHITE LINE

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 19 Calle San Martín
title_short: (33740) Tapia de Casariego - 19 Calle San Martín
description: Nice free public parking in a well-kept field, 8 minutes walk from the center, uncrowded and quiet at night.

title: (27795) A Rochela - Unnamed Road
description: Esteiro Beach in Ribadeo. A hundred meters away there is a parking lot for ACs, and a tavern further on. If you are in vans, there is a small walkway between the park and the bar and you can reach the picnic area on the beach. There is a shower!

title: (33748) Tapia de Casariego - Cuesta Barredo
description: Quiet, flat site, in front of the cemetery, near orchards and houses.

title: (27795) A Rochela - LU-P-0610
description:
Wide open field, and an area with sea views.

between 8:00- 10:00 AM a baker comes every day with freshly baked bread and cake

title: (27795) Ribadeo - 12T Lugar Cinxe
description: Laundry with dryer. 8 and 18 kg washing machines. 18 kg dryer. Supermarket with everything…a visit is highly recommended!

title: (27766) Trabada - N-640
description: Parking with green area and river views. Tables to eat. Water fountain and children's area.

title: (33746) Asturias - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful views, and a couple of tables. Incredible sunset, but especially sunrise. Bread and tranquility. Only vans, paved terrain to get there. Enter one or two at most. Something on a slope

title: (27796) Noceda - Unnamed Road
description: Only recommended for 4x4 except if you are players.. starting from a screen, magnificent view of the coast and the mountains. flat terrain.

name: Camping Nosa Casa
title: (27794) Camping Nosa Casa
description: Correct and fairly quiet campsite. The sanitary facilities are clean. Very nice walk possible towards the beach of the cathedrals, the access is paying.

title: (33746) Tapia de Casariego -
description: Fallback solution in case of strong wind on the cliff. Poetic playground for children. No services.

title: (27766) Trabada - Unnamed Road
description: Elevated esplanade without services. With wonderful views. Ideal if you are looking for tranquility and disconnection. You go up a track that can be a bit muddy for the first few meters, but immediately becomes a very passable gravel track, don't panic. A few meters from the San Fernando viewpoint.

title: (27766) - 4D Estrada General N-640
description: Nice motorhome area. Quiet area and very close to the Eo River. With picnic area

title: (27793) Barreiros - 30 LU-P-0610
description: Large parking grass. ideal parking for access to the beach. restaurant nearby

title: (27766) Trabada - LU-132
description: Old road bordering the new one. Possible to park on the side with several. Slight incline but OK for sleeping. No traffic at night and little during the day. Without limit weight, height, width length.

title: (27793) Barreiros - 1 LU-P-0610
description:
Paved parking, very large spaces 20m from the beach, toilets and showers relatively close, very quiet, close to the beach of the cathedrals, around 9:00 am baker's truck pass.
 Forbidden for motorhomes

title: (27793) Barreiros - 7 Estrada Costa S Miguel
description: Area with six picnic tables with mini park. You have to park at 100m, but it's worth it. Very good views.

title: (33740) Tapia de Casariego -
description: Passing the small town you will find 3 trails where you can enjoy with the AC. The first is more intimate, a small plot with views of the cliff, 2 is similar but the plot is much larger, and 3 has spectacular views and several plots, they have even built some tables to eat. Spectacular.

title: (27793) - 40 Lugar Praia San Miguel
description: Beautiful view, 3 minutes from a beach and 1/2 hour walk from the beach cathedrals. Quiet place with grass.

title: (27792) Barreiros - 12 LU-P-0610
description: Grass parking in front of the beach. Quiet, close to the Praia de las Cathedrales but away from the world. Snack, toilet and shower at the top of the beach.

title: (33746) Tapia de Casariego -
description:
Spot on the top of the cliffs, breathtaking view for a van or a 4x4.
Presence of two picnic tables. If no place, the spot just before will allow you to find a place

title: (27793) Barreiros - 1 Lugar Praia San Miguel
description:
Parking to go down to the dog beach.
We stayed overnight with no problem.
It fills up quickly with those who go to the beaches. Around 9:30 the baker comes by offering us breakfast. At the main entrance to the beach (5 min by walk) there are showers and a fountain and it is easy to access, since the two entrances in front of the parking lot are somewhat more complicated.

title: (33746) Tapia de Casariego - Folgueiron
description: Beautiful place to stay and have breakfast. All alone on a cliff

title: (27792) Barreiros - 36 LU-P-0610
description: Public parking next to the beach. Very nice place, close to the famous cathedral beach. We sleep about 20 vehicles between vans and caravans. Very calm. There are two restaurants nearby. One for each side in less than five minutes on foot. The beautiful beach. Especially at low tide.

title: (27792) Barreiros - 69 LU-P-0610
description: Excellent parking with sea view, quiet, next to the road, at 9:30 the baker comes by with different oven products, there are approximately 30 parking lots and more next to the site, if you like surfing, this is your place place.

title: (27792) Barreiros - 30 LU-P-0610
description: Large free public grass parking right by the beach. no services

name: Camping Benquerencia Playa
title: (27792) Camping Benquerencia Playa
description: Campsite 300 m from the beach. Free water and emptying. Hot water.

title: (27792) Barreiros - 55 LU-P-0610
description:
Small parking next to the road. The road is not busy at all and lit at night. It's in  front of a restaurant called A Ribeira and it is next to a very nice beach to swim or go to with your dog. It's 'not allowed' 
for dogs, but when it's quiet it is okay. The restaurant is very nice and cheap. You can get wifi there and sit as long as you want to. If you park close enough you can still catch their wifi. You can also park in front of it, but this is their parking.. so I would not. Also very close to a camping with a public bar, restaurant and a small supermarket. You can use the toilet in the restaurant or from the camping. Maybe you can even use their (hot!) showers if you ask nicely. Very kind people. there are also showers and public toilets on the beaches.

title: (33746) El Franco - 610 Caserio Porcia
description: Natural site, flat, ideal for a very quiet overnight stay, beach shower with cold water, tables and barbecues, old mineral loading dock at 100m, very beautiful stone beach, good fishing. Easiest access is off 634 at Campos by bus stop as it is not so twisty. I found it very easy in my LWB Vivaro. it is steep

title: (33746) El Viso -
description: Beautiful remote spot and the end of path, completely surrounded by nature, no street lights or noise. remember to keep your doors close at night lots of friendly mosquitos around after dark!

title: (27792) Barreiros - 14 LU-P-0610
description: Free municipal parking all along the coast. Beach shower and WC near emergency houses. Calm with space during the week maybe different on weekends.

name: A Gaivota Camping
title: (27792) A Gaivota Camping
description:
Camping Poblado Gaivota, small campsite by the sea Beautiful views - perfect for a couple of relaxing days
Places well protected from the wind by high hedges
Only cash is accepted

title: (27792) Barreiros - 11 LU-P-0610
description: Free carpark on beach in front of formal campsite. Toilets, beach showers, water, bins, picnic benches in front of surf break. Would be a great place to wake up in.

title: (33746) El Franco - 113B Lugar el Franco
description: A quiet place to park with good views of Porcia beach

title: (33746) El Viso -
description:
Marked P2, it is an enabled meadow, easy to maneuver as long as it is not full of cars.
Access to Porcia beach.
Suitable for motorhomes over 7m, since P1 is somewhat more complex to access.
I understand that, as in P1, you cannot stay overnight (there is no sign about it).

name: Coto Camper
title: (27792) Coto Camper
description: Private area 100 meters from Coto Beach in Barreiros. 8 km from the beach of Las Catedrales. Area with all the services available on the land itself (water loading and emptying, as well as a 6 amp electrical outlet). Large plots with lawn. It has showers, a sink area and a laundry room. Very quiet place and close to gas station and supermarkets.

title: (27792) Barreiros - 48 LU-P-0610
description: Parking for day and night. Very quiet near the beach. A very large place.

title: (27765) Trabada - 12 LU-P-6104
description: Picnic area between trees. Short excursion next to the river suitable for children. Very calm. In the middle of nowhere No flies. To spend the night without problem.

title: (33778) - 1A Caserio Aguillon
description: 2 car parks at the start of the short hike to the Cioyo waterfall. Quiet and flat. Magnificent waterfall.

title: (33746) El Franco - 155 Lugar el Franco
description: Place in nature, total view of the sea, quite exposed to the wind and high quality! Seen superb on the beds and lifts of suns despite some frequent clouds. To preserve!

name: Camping A Grandella
title: (33746) Camping A Grandella
description: Camping a grandella, a charming campsite in Asturias ..... quiet, ideal for exploring western Asturias and part of the Galician coast, near Porcía beach, with wooden huts, pet friendly

title: (27790) Barreiros - 1 Rúa Praia-Remior
description: Ample parking on Coto beach. There are toilets and a shower at the exit of the beach. Calm for the night.

title: (27790) Barreiros -
description: Quiet place ... access by track in good condition ... with sustained incline.

name: Camping Amaido
title: (33774) Camping Amaido
description: San Tirso de Abres, Barrio Menciñas. Farm campsite. Ideal for children with visit and give food to animals. At the start of the Eo greenway.

title: (33774) San Tirso de Abres - Km. 26 N-640
title_short: (33774) San Tirso de Abres - Km. 26 N-640
description: Gas Station with Shower Service. Although small, it is Clean for toilet and quick Shower. Free service at the gas station. I think it is sensible to spend fuel as the shower is free. very nice boy

title: (33774) - 1A Barrio la Carretera
description: Although close to the highway, it is quiet because at night the traffic is very scarce. It is also possible to park and spend the night in the parking lot next to the river beach. All this thanks to the municipality of San Tirso de Abres.

title: (33774) San Tirso de Abres - S/N El Llano
title_short: (33774) San Tirso de Abres - S/N El Llano
description: Recreational area attached to the river Eo with tables to eat, fountain, litter bins, barbecues, etc. Quiet and peaceful place.

title: (33746) Mernes - 10279 Caserio Mernes
description: Parking for the visit to Viavelez,. Typical port of the area, with its houses on the hillside. It is the hometown of Corin Tellado. Some squares are a bit inclined

title: (27790) - 53P Lugar Viladaide
description: New area free motor homes in San Cosme de Barreiros, has 10 seats for maximum overnight 48h (controlled by Civil Guard), water intake and discharge of gray and chemical, public baths to 10 meters, showers on the beach, play area children, promenade to the Cathedrals (8km), fishing area and water sports (paddle surfing, canoeing, windsurfing, kite-surfing etc..) restaurants at 200m and 200m supermarket these only during the verano. No is allowed out tables, chairs and other activities acampada.-

title: (33746) La Caridad - 16 Avenida del Padre Montaña
title_short: (33746) La Caridad - 16 Avenida del Padre Montaña
description: Parking in La Caridad, quiet and safe. a specific location for cars

title: (27788) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area at Foz beach. Tables with or without shade, games for children, WC and cold shower. A priori we can swim but it was low tide and not sure that the water is very clean. View of Foz and its ria.

title: (27780) Foz - 9D Rúa Xesus Nazareno
description: Parking area, no services

title: (27780) Foz - 6T Escalinata Rapadoira
description: Esplanade for motorhomes in front of the cliffs. I don't know if you can stay overnight, but there are 4 parked campers.

title: (27768) Trabada - 6 LU-132
description: Large mixed gravel and grass area next to small church with many stone picnic tables and stone barbecue points. Tap with fresh drinking water but no emptying. Stopped for long lunch only. Didn't overnight but this place is at least a kilometre away from the nearest house so overnight sleeping possible. Strong telephone signals.

title: (33746) El Franco - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area 200 meters from the beach. There is a restaurant with toilets. At the end of the road behind a few trees with tables, barbecues and swings. Beach without services.

title: (27780) Foz - 27H Rua Ollo do Mar
description:
Small esplanade of land 100 m from the promenade and beaches.
no services, only parking

title: (27788) Foz -
description: Location in front of the estuary, for 3/4 vehicles, very quiet, beautiful views, nearby public toilets, slightly sloping terrain

title: (27780) Foz - Travesía da Travesía Riveira
description: Quiet parking on the seafront and next to the port

title: (33746) El Franco - Unnamed Road
description: A place sheltered from the wind but above all very quiet, we spent an afternoon and night immersed in nature. only off-road or van no camper

title: () Foz - 6 Rúa do Ru Curbeiro
description: There is a wide grassy area where motorhomes park, looking directly over the estuary. The small services unit allows you to drive over the drain for grey waste.

title: (27780) Foz - 20 Rúa Eduardo Pondal
description: Self-service laundry

title: (33750) El Franco - 122B Carretera General Longara
description: Cambaredo dog beach car park.

title: (27780) Foz - 30 Rúa Corporacións Municipais
description: Self-service laundry. Open 08:00-22:00 365 days. Free parking on the street.

title: (27780) Foz - 35 Rúa Antón Vilar Ponte
description:
Self-service laundry 800 meters from the camper area.
Three washing machines of and three dryers.
Very spacious and clean laundry room.

title: (27788) Foz -
description: At the end of a forest track between a eucalyptus forest there is a corner where you can park one or two vans. The road is in good condition.

title: (33775) Aguillón - 2A Aldea Aguillon
description: Excellent place to sleep with a picnic area next to it and a river where you can bathe, we asked a gentleman in the area and there is no problem sleeping here, it is an abandoned school

title: (27780) Foz - 118 Avenida Ferreiro Rodríguez
description: Beach car park, empty out of season (end of November) facing the sea, beach shower nearby.

title: (33775) Aguillón - 7A Aldea Aguillon
description: Rest area by the river. It is divided into two parts. The first can be accessed by vehicle but it has little shade. The second you have to park on the road but very shady. Very calm.

title: (33757) La Caridad - Unnamed road
description: Small parking lot near stairs to beautiful beach where parking is possible for a maximum of 48 hours. There are 6 parking places but only 2 larger mobile homes can be parked, vans can park up to 6. There is a sign clearly stating which rules to follow. It is wonderful to stay there. Sleeping with the sound of the waves and waking up with a beautiful view, wonderful. There is also a field with a picnic area. It was clean, please keep this with you.

title: (27780) Foz - Camiño Forxán
description: Roadside little passer on grass, flat, alone in the quiet off season ... beach shower, easy access, beautiful setting with open views, walks and fishing.

title: (33799) Alto Penouta - AS-22
description: The Penauta park has a beautiful delimited forest to get lost in, with two picnic areas, viewpoints, both inland and along the coast, and dolmens. Small vans will be able to enter the forest area without much problem and even sleep next to the Pena Queimada Recreational Area. We have done it several times with the van. Although the stone and dirt path has more and more holes. For AC I would recommend staying at the entrance, next to the Penauta recreational area. You can park on the side of the small road that leads to the windmills. Now with the 6.5 meter AC we have been able to maneuver without much problem, but it is clear that there is no parking as such. You could also sleep here but the nearby presence of the windmills already gives a good idea of what the wind is blowing here. Be careful with the GPS because if you go from the coast the last section will put you on a complicated road. The best thing is to go to Boal or Rozadas and from there it already indicates you without problem.

title: (33775) Taramundi - 1A Poblado Taramundi
description: Picnic area near Taramundi. Ideal for a drink and contemplate the views. It is under cover for those rainy days.

title: (33776) Penacova -
description: Belle esplanade tranquille accessible par un chemin roulant. Très belle vue.

title: (27798) Vilamar - 8 Lugar Vilamar
description: Level place on completely flat cement. Surrounded by trees that cut the wind on bad days. Very calm. It has a playground, a couple of tables, a small shed and a lot of land, ideal for families and pets. It has drinking water and containers. There is a bar 200 meters away in the village. Please keep it clean.

title: (33729) Vega de Ouria -
description: Fairly flat parking next to the Pena Queimada recreational area. Area with tables, drinking fountain and container. Very quiet, in the middle of nature, with spectacular views and only 5km from the town of Boal where all services are available and a motorhome area with a water point and deposit discharge. Also a wonderful place from which to start various hiking trails. As a negative point, the access road is not in very good condition. If you go through this area you will not regret it, but please, respect the space and collect the garbage.

title: (33775) Taramundi - 5A Barrio la Rectoral
description: Small recreational area with months and a grill for barbecues

title: (27787) FOZ (Lugo) - Atalaia Camper Park (FOZ ) ctra general Forxan 2E
title_short: (27787) FOZ (Lugo) - Atalaia Camper Park  (FOZ )     ctra general Forxan 2E
description: Area with a multitude of services, large enclosed squares, power point, showers, washing machines, dryers, iron, wiffi, TV area and snacks, area for dogs, free bicycles, shopping service from the supermarket, daily bread and pastries service, very close to the center.

address.street: Atalaia Camper Park  (FOZ )     ctra general Forxan 2E

title: (27787) Foz - Av. de Peizas
description: Parking on the edge of the cliff with a much better view than its little brother next door, but without the beach and services, without bins but without waste on the ground (very rare around here) so without the noisy parking lot of beach attendants. We are Sunday afternoon at the end of July, just tourists who pass by on foot and by bike, few in number.. the sound of the sea, that's all. I will spend the night there. The Guarda Civil makes crossings on the road at 200 meters. I think the same rules apply as for the beach parking next door. Without unpacking tables, camping chairs etc. it must be ok for 24, 48 hours. It's summer !

title: (33775) Taramundi - 24A Redondela
description: Another car park near the village. Slightly inclined with a view.

title: (33775) Taramundi - Barrio los Castros
description: Shared parking with cars, maximum stay 48 hours. Drainage services, faucet.

title: (33775) Taramundi - 41A Avenida Galicia
description: Esplanade next to the road before reaching Taramundi (from Cabaniñas). Perfect for visiting Taramundi. It is located 2 minutes from the town. Has pending

title: (33775) Taramundi - 11A Poblado Taramundi
description: Large esplanade with benches to eat.

title: (33775) - 11A Poblado TaramundiTaramundi
description: AC filling and emptying area

title: (27787) Foz - Av. de Peizás
description: One of the many car parks on the coast. Very nice view, on the rocks near a beach, on the walking path.

title: (33719) Cartavio - Unnamed Road
description:
Rest area with parking, barbecue and tables. forbidden to stay there overnight.
beautiful sea view.

title: (27787) Foz - 4 Lugar Mourente
description: Recreational area with trees, tables and fountain.

title: (27789) Foz - 15 Camiño Forxán
description: Beach edge sanitary shelter tables small bay beach next door.

title: (27720) A Puentenuevo - 33 N-640
description: Picnic area with tables, fountain and barbecue. We only stopped to eat but could spend the night even though it is near the road

title: (27789) Foz - 29 Avenida de Peizás
description: Parking in front of the beach. August 8 we found a place without problems. There are public toilets on the beach, which are good. They close at 7:30 p.m. Level Ground. To the center of Foz 30 minutes walking.

title: (33776) Villanueva de Oscos - AS-27
description: Parking with very good views. Next to the road.

name: Camping San Rafael
title: (27789) Camping San Rafael
description: Family "Camping San Rafael" on the beach of Peizás. Quiet and clean place. showers included in price accept ACSI 2 people + camper + hot showers: 22,74€

title: (33775) Calvín - 12A Aldea Calvin
description: Flat area in the middle of nature

title: (27787) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: O pico da lebre viewpoint, from where you can see the town of Foz and the mouth of its estuary to the Cantabrian Sea.

title: (33719) Loza - Unnamed Road
description: Looks like a beautiful place to park. scenic beach

title: (33775) Conjunto etnográfico de Teixois - 1A Aldea Teijois
title_short: (33775) Conjunto etnográfico de Teixois - 1A Aldea Teijois
description: It is recommended to go early to park the car. The first guided tour is at 11:30, from that moment it is filled with vehicles to visit the town (at least in summer). In spite of parking the motorhome well, we had problems when it came to people who were not civic when parking their vehicles. In the “chigre” of the town good tapas to taste next to the River.

title: (27787) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect parking to visit the Basilica of San Martiño de Mondoñedo. The oldest cathedral in Spain, located in Foz.

title: () Foz - Camiño Caldouceiro
description: Free public beach parking Une Pampillosa (Fazouro). Very calm. beach tables, bathrooms; hike across the road by the Ouro River. Within 10 minutes of Foz and Burela.

title: (27760) Lourenzá - 4 Estrada a Masma
description: Pk to the center of the town. 20 places. Containers, prat amb herba i portaries. eroski i llibreria al costat. Lloc molt silence and tranquility. Font d'aigua.

title: (33720) Llaviada - 1A Caserio Llaviada
description: Space opened in September 2016 Next to the football field.

title: (33719) Coaña - 102 Carretera Mohías
description: Gas station with very helpful people who helped us fill our loose plastic LPG bottle. Super nice because no gas station wanted to help us.
